title: The synergistic effects of organic composts and microelements co-application in enhancing potato productivity in saline soils
content:
Publication date: Available online 12 June 2024

Source: Heliyon

Author(s): Ayman M. El-Ghamry, Mohamed A. El-Sherpiny, Abd-Elbaset A. Alkharpotly, Dina A. Ghazi, Amal A. Helmy, Manzer H. Siddiqui, Mohammad Pessarakli, Mohammad Anwar Hossain, Eman M. Elghareeb
